objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has the ability to decrypt its payload prior to execution.(Citation: Lab52 MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD MAY 2023)(Citation: EclecticIQ Mustang Panda PlugX)(Citation: Palo Alto Networks, Unit 42)(Citation: Sophos Mustang Panda PLUGX) [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has also utilized RC4 encryption for malicious payloads.(Citation: Google Threat Intelligence Group MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX August 2025)(Citation: Unit42 Bookworm Nov2015)
